event.title: Hack Happiness Hackathon
event.location: 9:30am - 6:30pm,  ROAD Studio: Roger de Llúria 71-75, 08009 Barcelona, Barcelona
event.description: Join designers, programmers, strategists and project managers for a day-long hackathon to build mobile and web apps to help bring more happiness to people’s lives, companies and the world.
